summary:
General John is the 2nd version of my other mod \"John The Follower\" but revised so this follower has more experience and stats than the old one and is more battle ready with level 25 stats! Find him in Whiterun above the Guard Shack or just spawn him with this command in the console:

player.placeatme 03000D62

Thank You And Enjoy
descriptionHtml:
General John is the 2nd version of my other mod \"John The Follower\" but revised so this follower has more experience and stats than the old one and is more battle ready with level 25 stats! Find him in Whiterun above the Guard Shack or just spawn him with this command in the console:

player.placeatme 03000D62

Thank You And Enjoy
author: jedijosh920
